title: Taken by the Ghost of Napoleon Bonaparte's Horny Little Brother, Jerome, at Niagara Falls
description: When a vampire meets the sexy ghost of Jerome Bonaparte at Niagara Falls, will she be swept away by his manly navigational skills? Follow our heroine's amazing adventures as she's taken over the falls in more ways than one.  This is a short, erotic tale that doesn't take itself seriously.  For mature (18+ years old) readers. Book contains scenes of explicit sex, Niagara Falls trivia, and intimate ghostly encounters in a boat.
author: Maddie Montrose
